channel.description: Recent content in workshop on Stefan Kis

item.title: Connecting high-energy astroparticle physics for origins of cosmic rays and future perspectives
item.description: Organizers: Yukawa Institute for Theoretical Physics, Kyoto University Location: Kyoto, Japan Date: 7th of December 2020 - 10th of December 2020 School website: Website Main topics: Observational astrophysics (X-Ray, MeV, GeV, TeV gamma rays & other messengers –cosmic rays & neutrinos–) Review of recent progress in cosmic-ray physics
